description: Sequence satisfies T(a)=a, where T is defined below.
references: S. Viswanath (student, Dept. Math, Indian Inst. Technology, Kanpur) A Note on Partition Eigensequences, preprint, Nov 15 1996.
links: M. Bernstein and N. J. A. Sloane, Some canonical sequences of integers, Linear Alg. Applications, 226-228 (1995), 57-72; erratum 320 (2000), 210.
formula: Define T:a->b by: given a1<=a2<=..., remove duplicates, keep only numbers = +-1 mod 5, getting c1<c2<...; define b1, b2, ... by 1+Sum bi*x^i = Product 1/(1-x^ci).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
